code:
%%{Education_GradeSync} }%%
sequenceDiagram
  participant Command Engine
  participant Routing Utility
  
  rect rgba(Education_ContentCDN)
    Command Engine->>Routing Utility: sli_routing_utility_route_packet(Education_GradeSync)
    Note over Command Engine: Calls route packet function
  end
  rect rgba(Education_GradeSync)
    
    alt is_destination_entry_invalid
        Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: Return SL_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER
    end
     
  end
  
  
  rect rgba(Education_LMS_Portal)

        alt destination_packet_handler function is not defined
          Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: Error status code
        end
        Routing Utility->>Routing Utility: Call entry->destination_packet_handler(Education_LMS_Portal)  
        Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: status success  
    
  end

  rect rgba(Education_StudentDB)
    Command Engine->>Routing Utility: sli_routing_utility_route_queue_node(Education_GradeSync)
    Note over Command Engine: Calls route queue node function
  end
  rect rgba(Education_ClassroomService)
    
    alt is_destination_entry_invalid
        Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: Return SL_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER
    end
     
  end
  
  
  rect rgba(Education_StudentDB)
        
        alt queue_handle is defined
            Routing Utility->>Routing Utility: sli_queue_manager_enqueue(Education_LMS_Portal)
             
                Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: Return status code
             
        end
        alt destination_packet_handler function is defined
            Routing Utility->>Routing Utility: Call entry->destination_packet_handler(Education_LMS_Portal)
            Note over Routing Utility: Extracts data from packet and calls handler
                Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: Return status code
            
        end
        
          Routing Utility-->>Command Engine: status success  
    
  end
repo_description: Next-generation Silicon Labs Wi-Fi API for SiWx91x chipset family.
